Meditation is not for everyone. meditation instructors often push practice without warnings of potential hazards. I've used daily calm every night for 1.5 years, and I started having chronic insomnia for months. I had blamed it on jet lag, overtraining, stress, weight loss and couldn't fix it. One day I got so angry with the practice, I quit meditating. sleep improved immediately. no more nighttime awakenings. I had no idea meditation was killing my sleep.
